text: Va kasone [az munofiqon hastand], ki ʙaroi zijon rasondan [ʙa musulmonon] va [taqvijati] kufru tafriqaafkani mijoni mu'minon mascide soxtand, [to] kamingohe ʙosad ʙaroi kasone, ki ʙo Alloh taolo va pajomʙaras az pes dar cang ʙudand va, alʙatta, onon savgand jod mekunand, ki qasde cuz neki [va xidmat] nadostaem. Va Alloh taolo guvohi medihad, ki onon, hatman, duruƣgu hastand
